author: slaws
msg: Set the default maven build to not generate distribution archives but generate a directory instead. To run a build that generates the archives use mvn -Pdistribution instead.

author: spoole
msg: The ant driven version of the test execution was unstable. This is a change to move that process into maven. The tck testcases have been moved from the tck.testsuite module (which will be removed)

author: marrs
msg: refactored existing tests to use static inner classes to avoid potential name clashes between tests, added a new test

author: ningjiang
msg: CAMEL-2219 added snippet tag for wiki document

author: mmartinec
msg: bumped up the t/rcvd_parser.t 'plan tests' count by one
